title: #237 - The Bear King Kills - Hillsdale, New York
description:
This week, in Hillsdale, New York, a most brutal, smoldering murder is a mystery, at first, but quickly focuses on one suspect, who turns out to have one of the wildest tales that we've ever heard. Was he a person, with a simple motive for murder, or was he a deranged man, on a mission from God, who believes that he is simultaneously King Arthur, Jesus, Robin Hood, Merlin The Wizard, a ninja, and The Bear King? That's the question, but either way, this was a truly awful & vicious murder!!

 

Along the way, we find out that Slambodovia isn't a real country, that Merlin apparently had a forehead tattoo, and that when you're on a mission from God, you don't need an attorney!

 

Hosted by James Pietragallo & Jimmie Whisman 

 

New episodes every Thursday!
